definition: commodity grain (grain produced as a commodity rather than for self-sufficiency)
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 河西走廊被譽爲甘肅的糧倉和全國的商品糧基地之一。

sentences.english: Jilin is also China's key commodity grain base.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省是中國主要的商品糧生產基地。

sentences.english: Jilin Province is China's major agricultural province and the country's commodity grain base.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省是我國的農業大省和國家的商品糧基地。

sentences.english: Jilin province is the main maize production region and significant commercial food base of China.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省是我國玉米的主要產區和重要的商品糧基地。
